title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When trying to add an exception breakpoint, if the user clicks cancel in the progress dialog, the dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up even though the cancelation request was made. It should either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button. When calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, pass 'false' for the canceleable parameter.
SR: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the 'J!' button to add an exception. 3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
